item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description: Spring 2021 6/1/21 - Reticle: A Virtual Machinefor Programming Modern FPGAs, Luis Vega (Washington), zoom webinar 5/25/21 - A New Era of Open-Source System-on-Chip Design, Christopher Batten (Cornell), talk details, zoom webinar 5/18/21 - ScaleHLS: Scalable High-Level Synthesis through MLIR, Hanchen Ye (UIUC), zoom webinar 5/11/21 - Polynomial Chaos Expansion (PCE) Methods with the Xyce Circuit Simulator, Eric Keiter (Sandia), talk details, recording

item.title: Publications
item.description: 2020 Heiner Litz, Milad Hashemi, Machine Learning for Systems. IEEE Micro 40(5), 6-7, 2020. Akash Sridhar, Nursultan Kabylkas, Jose Renau, Load Driven Branch Predictor (LDBP). CoRR abs/2009.09064, 2020. Nayana Prasad Nagendra, Grant Ayers, David I. August, Hyoun Kyu Cho, Svilen Kanev, Christos Kozyrakis, Trivikram Krishnamurthy, Heiner Litz, Tipp Moseley, Parthasarathy Ranganathan, AsmDB: Understanding and Mitigating Front-End Stalls in Warehouse-Scale Computers. IEEE Micro 40(3), 56-63, 2020.
